subject: Re: [junit] Re: SWT unit testing
msgSnippet: I haven t been following this thread, so this comment may be redundant... One source to look at for testing SWT things is Kent Beck s TDD book
messageBody:
I haven't been following this thread, so this comment may be redundant...

One source to look at for testing SWT things is Kent Beck's TDD book
(http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0321146530/102-3564878-6025713?v=glance).
I read it some time back, but as I recall he goes through creating the JUnit
plug-in in a test-first fashion. So, he's bound to have tests in the book
for SWT components.

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
